comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Wikipeida on Raymond Poincaré, " French statesman who served five times as Prime Minister, and as President from 1913 to 1920."

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/cph.3f04027/ is a poster for another French tombola (raffle) in 1915, in aid of Belgian war refugees. and www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/cph.3f03942/ is a 1915 poster for a French tombola for war veterans.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you bior for the information about Poincare. And thank you swanq for providing links for these two magnificent posters for Belgian war relief.  I didn't see any mention of how the Petit Palais connected to the Tombola for artists. Does anyone know?
